title: The truth about obesity and Covid 19
description: A widely reported study claims that 90% of Covid 19 deaths across the world happened in countries with high obesity rates. While an individual’s risk of death is increased by having a high Body Mass Index, the broader effect on a country’s death rate is not what it seems.
itunes:subtitle: Are countries with higher obesity rates suffering from more deaths?
itunes:summary: A widely reported study claims that 90% of Covid 19 deaths across the world happened in countries with high obesity rates. While an individual’s risk of death is increased by having a high Body Mass Index, the broader effect on a country’s death rate is not what it seems.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
